items.name: Sorrow Needle
explicitMods: 53% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
+38% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier
0.26% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Minions have 17% increased Attack and Cast Speed

socketedItems.secDescrText: Animates a melee weapon or armour, attaching it to an invisible Guardian that fights by your side. Animating multiple items attaches them to the same Guardian. You cannot animate unidentified items. Cannot be used by Traps or Mines.
explicitMods: 76% increased Minion Maximum Life
Can use Items requiring up to Level 100
Minions' Attacks deal 126 to 184 additional Physical Damage
Minions deal 76% increased Physical Damage with Melee Attacks
Minions have 40% increased Movement Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Rune Glimmer
explicitMods: 4% chance to receive additional Talismans when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
8% chance in Heists for Orbs of Augmentation to drop as Orbs of Alchemy instead
6% chance in Heists for Items to drop Identified
items.descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this

items.name: Daresso's Courage
explicitMods: +30% Chance to Block Spell Damage while on Low Life
223% increased Armour and Evasion
+29% to all Elemental Resistances
+100% Chance to Block Attack Damage if you have Blocked Spell Damage Recently
+100% chance to Block Spell Damage if you have Blocked Attack Damage Recently
flavourText: By tourney's end, Daresso bled and shivered.
Yet even accursed treachery failed to steal the champion's victory.
